name: AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataSpeech
summary: Requester implementation for the Speech system permission
description:
AdswizzSDKPrivacyDataSpeech is an optional framework which provides support for the speech system permission.
See Apple's document on user privacy for details of available authorisations at https://developer.apple.com/documentation/uikit/core_app/protecting_the_user_s_privacy
